title: Endocrine glands
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Biology - Study and teaching

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Endocrine glands
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Insulin
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Biology - Study and teaching
description: By means of animation and microphotography, this film demonstrates the nature and function of the parathyroid, the pituitary, and the thyroid glands, and the pancreas. The use of insulin in treating diabetes is demonstrated, hyper and hypothyroidism are discussed, and stimulation of the mammary gland illustrated.
